tool.name: FASTQ-to-FASTA
tool.description: converts FASTQ file to FASTA format
tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool converts Solexa FASTQ data to FASTA format by generating 2 files, reads and quality scores.
-----
**Example1**
- Converting the following Solexa fastq data::
@seq1 GACAGCTTGGTTTTTAGTGAGTTGTTCCTTTCTTT +seq1 hhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhPW@hhhhhh @seq2 GCAATGACGGCAGCAATAAACTCAACAGGTGCTGG +seq2 hhhhhhhhhhhhhhYhhahhhhWhAhFhSIJGChO
- will extract the following sequences::
>seq1 GACAGCTTGGTTTTTAGTGAGTTGTTCCTTTCTTT >seq2 GCAATGACGGCAGCAATAAACTCAACAGGTGCTGG
- and quality scores::
>seq1 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 16 23 0 40 40 40 40 40 40 >seq2 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 25 40 40 33 40 40 40 40 23 40 1 40 6 40 19 9 10 7 3 40 15
**Example2**
- Converting the following Solexa fastq data::
@seq1 GAATTGATCAGGACATAGGACAACTGTAGGCACCAT +seq1 40 40 40 40 35 40 40 40 25 40 40 26 40 9 33 11 40 35 17 40 40 33 40 7 9 15 3 22 15 30 11 17 9 4 9 4 @seq2 GAGTTCTCGTCGCCTGTAGGCACCATCAATCGTATG +seq2 40 15 40 17 6 36 40 40 40 25 40 9 35 33 40 14 14 18 15 17 19 28 31 4 24 18 27 14 15 18 2 8 12 8 11 9
- will extract the following sequences::
>seq1 GAATTGATCAGGACATAGGACAACTGTAGGCACCAT >seq2 GAGTTCTCGTCGCCTGTAGGCACCATCAATCGTATG
- and quality scores::
>seq1 40 40 40 40 35 40 40 40 25 40 40 26 40 9 33 11 40 35 17 40 40 33 40 7 9 15 3 22 15 30 11 17 9 4 9 4 >seq2 40 15 40 17 6 36 40 40 40 25 40 9 35 33 40 14 14 18 15 17 19 28 31 4 24 18 27 14 15 18 2 8 12 8 11 9
